note.p: Daughter of William Howie and his wife Ellenor Macinalty of Inveresk and Musselburgh in East Lothian, Scotland; sister of Thomas Howie. Married David Carson in Shoreditch 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/261/116/33)
London, England, marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 December 2015)
Scotland old parish registers births 689 100 / 382 Inveresk and Musselburgh (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 29 November 2022)
